Java Puzzle #14: Integers

22 Oct 2012

What is the output of the following script? [java]public class SomeClass { public static void main(String[] args) { int x = 2147483647; // 2147483647 == 2*31 - 1 if (x < 2x) { System.out.println("Everything's ok:"); } else { System.out.println("It's weird:"); }

    System.out.println("x   = " + x);
    System.out.println("2*x = " + 2*x);
}

}[/java]

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Answer

[text]It's weird: x = 2147483647 2*x = -2[/text]

Explanation

2*x is out of Java Integer range, so it comes back at the other end.
